Address Space - ETROC2:
PeriStat0 - 0b00100100 to 0b10100100
PeriStat3 - 0b11011110 to 0b11011111
SEU Counter 0 - 0b00000010 to 0b00011110
PixStat2 Pixel 11,0 - 0b10100000 to 0b00100000
PixStat1 Pixel 9,1 - 0b11000110 to 0b11000100
PixStat1 Pixel 9,2 - 0b11000110 to 0b11000100
PixStat2 Pixel 10,5 - 0b10100111 to 0b10100011
PixStat1 Pixel 5,6 - 0b11000110 to 0b11000010
PixStat2 Pixel 11,6 - 0b10100010 to 0b10100000
PixStat6 Pixel 5,9 - 0b00000000 to 0b00010000
PixStat2 Pixel 10,11 - 0b10010111 to 0b10010011
PixStat2 Pixel 4,12 - 0b10010011 to 0b10010010
